description: The King Pine Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask King Pine for the snow report
Alexa, ask King Pine for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for King Pine
shortDescription: The King Pine Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for King Pine.
